parameters.name: featureTransformationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the feature transformation to describe.

nested_items.name: featureTransformation
nested_items.description: A listing of the FeatureTransformation properties.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the feature transformation.

nested_items.name: featureTransformationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureTransformation object.

nested_items.name: defaultParameters
nested_items.description: Provides the default parameters for feature transformation.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time (in Unix time) of the feature transformation.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The last update date and time (in Unix time) of the feature transformation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the feature transformation.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.
